summary: FAILED COIL PACK ON VEHICLE AFTER ONLY 16000 MILES.  DEALER SERVICE ADVISER STATED THAT VW IS AWARE OF THIS PROBLEM IN ALL 2001 THRU 2003 VW PASSATS WITH 1.8 LITER TURBO ENGINES.
